      • setManualProxy

        public void setManualProxy(java.lang.String httpHost,
                  int httpPort,
                  java.lang.String sslHost,
                  int sslPort,
                  java.lang.String ftpHost,
                  int ftpPort,
                  java.lang.String socksHost,
                  int socksPort,
                  java.lang.String noProxyFor)
        Description copied from interface: BrowserConfig
        Configures browser to use proxy setting by defining parameters for all proxy types. Use null, -1 if a particular proxy type should not be set.
        Specified by:
        setManualProxy in interface BrowserConfig
        Parameters:
        httpHost - host (ip address) for HTTP proxy
        httpPort - port for HTTP proxy
        sslHost - host (ip address) for HTTPS proxy
        sslPort - port for HTTPS proxy
        ftpHost - host (ip address) for FTP proxy
        ftpPort - port for FTP proxy
        socksHost - host (ip address) for SOCKS proxy
        socksPort - port for SOCKS proxy
        noProxyFor - list of host to bypass with proxies. The same format as in Firefox configuration dialog (comma separated)

      • setAutomaticProxy

        public void setAutomaticProxy(java.lang.String configURL)
        Description copied from interface: BrowserConfig
        Configures browser to use automatic proxy settings. (usually located in a file called proxy.pac)
        Specified by:
        setAutomaticProxy in interface BrowserConfig
        Parameters:
        configURL - url of a proxy.pac file
